fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigatate someone at night and learn their role.
- Kill someone at night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this is rolled, Seishin must appear too.
- Your investigation can be fooled by disguises.
- If you kill Seishin, you will join the rest of the foxes and gain their goal.
- If your attack kills someone else, the Foxes will learn your name, and your new goal will be to live until all Foxes perish.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that opposes the Foxes or Survive to the end.
